programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: The divorce of a couple leaves the mother with custody of their three children. The father dresses up as a proper British nanny so that he can be hired by his ex-wife to watch his own kids.(n)

programme.title: Herbie Goes To Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Herbie falls hood over wheels in love when he encounters a sleek, sporty, light-blue Lancia. Also vying for his attention is a gang of jewel thieves, who've ingeniously hidden a stolen gem in his gas tank!(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Based on a Stephen King novel, Carrie is the story of a girl brought up, almost in isolation, by her psychotically religious mother Margaret. After an embarrassing incident causes her fellow pupils to tease Carrie ruthlessly, her teacher disciplines the students severely. Determined to seek revenge, the students hatch a plot against Carrie, which turns horribly wrong when Carrie's strange mental powers are unleashed during the school prom.(n)

programme.title: Mr. House Husband
programme.desc: This reality show observes six men who do both housekeeping and parenting.(n)

programme.title: Studio K
programme.desc: Studio K is KBS' digital entertainment and music channel. Catch the most entertaining content right here!(n)

programme.title: Twenty
programme.desc: Freshly graduated from high school, best friends Chi Cho, Dong Woo and Kyung Jae have reached a crucial crossroads in their young lives. It's time to think about the future.(n)

programme.title: The Princess And The Matchmaker
programme.desc: Princess Songhwa refuses her fate to marry one of four suitors. Seo Do-yoon, skilled at interpreting marital harmony signs, is selected as the person to ascertain her best match.(n)

programme.title: The Bold, The Corrupt And The Beautiful
programme.desc: Madame Tang colludes and mediates between the government and private businesses for the benefits of her all-female family. One case does not go as planned, and an entire family close to Madame Tang falls victim to murder, changing Tang's relationships with her own family forever.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Boy
programme.desc: Lucky Boy chronicles several decades of the lives of Lin Yu and Qingqing, the girl whom he fell in love with in primary school and continues pining for throughout his tumultuous and eventful life.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Yuan Yuan is one of the nation's reputable designers. She has the world at her fingertips, but she carries a secret that she cannot let go. A woman opens up a distant past that she's left behind in Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: Huat The Fish
programme.desc: This story revolves around the lives of four fishermen who are buddies from a fishing village at Pulau Ketam. In order to settle a huge loan, the four buddies decide to venture into robbery. In their attempt, the four buddies crash into a real robbery scene.(n)

programme.title: The House That Never Dies II
programme.desc: During the last years of the Republic, the country was in chaos. With the warlords' mutiny in the capital, Marshal Zhang Zhisheng was forced to marry the great warlord's daughter Ji Jincui.(n)

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: Pei Yu Yan is a good student at school, and keeps a low profile as if she is a canary in a cage. Ever since she meets Yu Hao, her life changes; he is the boy who impresses her.(n)

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men Part 1
programme.desc: Ken Chow, a hot-headed rebellious youth, is forced to serve his two years of NS when he is enlisted into Basic Military Training as a recruit. He initially bemoans his fate alongside his squad mates. As striking personalities and different upbringings clash, they slowly learn about themselves.(n)

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three men on their way to monk-hood don't realise the temple at which they will receive their ordination is cursed by the wrath of Pee Nak, a mythical giant snake.(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: A series of mysterious deaths and illnesses takes place in an apparently peaceful village. The victims are thought to be killed by poisonous wild mushrooms, but police officer Jong Goo hears from the mysterious Moo Myung that a Japanese man is involved in the deaths.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: Doraemon The Movie : Nobita’s Great Adventure
programme.desc: Doraemon transports Nobita and his friends to a huge iceberg floating in the South Pacific. While creating an amusement park with the "ice-working iron", the group finds a mysterious golden ring.(n)

programme.title: The Scoundrels
programme.desc: One night, a robber hijacks Rui when he accidentally spots a seriously injured woman in the vehicle. Now the police and the public see Rui as the suspect of the bank robbery. How can Rui get himself out of this quagmire?(n)

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: This film talks about four relationships: A couple breaking up yet holding tight; a father and a daughter meeting up after a long separation; a girl escaping from growing up; and two buddies' reunion after years of misunderstanding.(n)

programme.title: Mon Mon Mon Monsters
programme.desc: Lin Shu-wei is assigned to do community service alongside some bullies. As the gang of bullies progressively accept him as one of their own, Lin partakes in their misdeeds. During a night out, the group stumble upon a pair of flesh-eating female ghouls and capture one of them.(n)

programme.title: Shed Skin Papa
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man is tasked with taking care of his elderly father, only to discover that the man is shedding a layer of skin every day, making him younger in the process.(n)

programme.title: Lion Dancing 2
programme.desc: Peng and Shun are the leaders of a traditional lion dance troupe. When the chance comes up to mount a performance in Mainland China, they eagerly seize it. Unfortunately, before they can enact their plan, they're swindled out of their funds by a scheming con-man.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ben, a hacker, works at the B&S Memory Bank where an individual's memories can be stored, reviewed as well as erased. He becomes fascinated by Ai: even though she has been physically abused by her lover, she continues to love him deeply and revisit her memories with him constantly.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - The Moon Is Always Full
programme.desc: On the night of a super moon, radio host Veena receives a call from her mother who had committed suicide. She begins to investigate the cause of her mother's depression and is determined to change the past, but her actions are not without consequences.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius
programme.desc: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating in tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot in Sydney, Australia. Lynn and her classmates have to deliver the test answers back.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well
programme.desc: The Yau brothers team up with fellow con-artists - the Lui sisters - to scam an infamous mob boss.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Men
programme.desc: Shi Shen is the top performer in the Tiger Crane Lion Dance Association, but feels restricted by Master He's traditional mindset. He decides to take in a group of disciples and forms his own lion dance troupe, which fuses hip-hop and rock with lion dance movements.(n)

programme.title: 23:59 The Haunting Hour
programme.desc: Recruit Tommy is bullied by his army mates. He seeks comfort from the compliments left by his readers on his blog that features fictitious army horror stories he writes. One day, things starts to go awry.(n)

programme.title: Plastic City
programme.desc: Chinese-Brazilian crime boss Yuda and his adopted son Kirin stand at the head of a massive pirated goods operation that brings in both money and influence. The good times run dry when Yuda lands in jail.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser ()
programme.desc: Goodbye Mr Loser is a film about a middle-aged nobody who passes out drunk and magically travels back to his school days.(n)

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A mystery drama revolving around a father who commits an unethical act to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him, trapping him in an endless time loop.(n)

programme.title: Shadow
programme.desc: In Pei, a kingdom ruled by an unpredictable king, the military commander faces peril both inside and outside the palace walls. But he has a secret weapon: a "shadow", a look-alike who can fool both Pei's enemies and the King himself.(n)

programme.title: Our Times
programme.desc: Lin Zhen Xin is a high-schooler who harbours a crush on her school's least ordinary, most adored boy Ouyang Fei Fan. After a chance encounter acquaints her with school ruffian Xi Tai Yu, she discovers that they have something in common: He has a crush on Fei Fan's female counterpart, Tao Min Min.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: Filial Party
programme.desc: A group of contestants from various social backgrounds battle it out on a TV game show, I Am Filial, in which the one deemed most filial to his parents will win $1 million. Game show host Millionaire Liu (Mark Lee) plots to complicate things for the sake of increasing viewership ratings.(n)

programme.title: My Egg Boy
programme.desc: A woman freezes her eggs and looks for the right man to start a family. In the pursuit of this man, she ends up in a wintry Swedish Province, where ice and snow become a metaphor for the unborn child who is waiting to be born.(n)

programme.title: Missing ()
programme.desc: In 2005, a high-profile case of a police officer who disappeared during a forest hike spawned urban legends about the existence of a gateway into another world. Those legends are now adapted into an eerie supernatural thriller.(n)

programme.title: One Night Only
programme.desc: Having lost all his fortune and loved ones from gambling, Gao Ye walks out from prison to an even crueler world. Intrigued by a beautiful hooker who approaches him for unknown reason, he comes up a master plan to redeem everything he once had, but things spin wildly out of control.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: Demi Haunted
programme.desc: Buster is a bit player in a Cantonese Opera troupe who has never had a starring role. But when a ghost starts causing trouble during the production, he finds himself being asked to play a female lead.(n)

programme.title: Monga
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, Monga centres around five boys who join the Gang of Princes. As the Gang of Princes rise in stature, they come into conflict with other gangs jealous of their growing power.(n)

programme.title: Triple Tap
programme.desc: Champion competitive marksman Ken comes across an armoured van robbery. He sees a policeman held hostage and shoots and kills four of the robbers. One of the robbers escapes. Soon after, Ken is attacked by the escaped robber Pang Tao.(n)

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: This film follows the lives of kindhearted working mother Mrs. Cheung, her blank but agreeable teenage son Ka On, and their lonely elderly neighbour who works at the same supermarket as Mrs. Cheung.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Men: Ultimate Showdown
programme.desc: Having witnessed Mikey and Babyface's performance at the first leg of the lion dance competition, and finding out about Mikey's feelings for Xiao Yu, Shi Shen begins to see him as a rival. To prepare for the final leg of the competition, Shi Shen throws himself into practice, neglecting Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Wayang Boy
programme.desc: The film follows 10-year-old Raja, an Indian boy who's recently been brought to Singapore by his stepmother Emma. After Raja gets into a scuffle with his new classmates Xavier and Shi Han, all three boys end up in detention.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: This comedy centres around a mahjong master, Andy, and his dealings with his ex-girlfriend, estranged family and a local gang.(n)

programme.title: Cook Up A Storm
programme.desc: A Cantonese street cook and his chief rival, a French-trained Michelin-starred chef, discover they have a lot in common as they prepare for a world-famous culinary competition.(n)

programme.title: The Bride
programme.desc: Han and Hao are about to get married soon when Hao picks up a strange red envelope on the street. Then, all hell breaks loose with a vengeful supernatural bride wreaking havoc on his life.(n)

programme.title: Saving Mr. Wu
programme.desc: An action-packed crime thriller based on the true story of China's famous celebrity kidnapping case. Mr. Wu is kidnapped in Beijing by Zhang Hua and three accomplices, all disguised as cops. In the ensuing 20 hours, Chinese detectives led by Chief Xing quickly form a task force to sweep the city.(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: Love Undercover
programme.desc: Fong graduates from police school, but her poor performance limits her to trivial jobs in the station. Eventually she is assigned an important task - posing as a waitress to plant a bug on a suspect.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: College friends Ah Lok, Bo Zai and Ming Ming have been struggling financially since graduating. The three get involved in an ATM heist, but the machine accidentally ends up on the grounds of a retirement home.(n)

programme.title: Murmur Of The Hearts
programme.desc: Nan and Mei are brother and sister growing up on the beautiful Green Island, off the shore of the port city of Taitung in Taiwan. But soon their parents separate. Four-year-old Mei goes to Taipei with her mother, while seven-year-old Nan stays on Green Island with his father.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong
programme.desc: Another gambling movie from Wong Jing, who combines the fun of kung fu and mahjong this time round!(n)

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, when a tiger escapes from the zoo, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's house. Having no place to go, he wanders around while working as a substitute driver and meets his old girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Spl2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: The world's top thieves join forces to pull off the heist of a lifetime. But when they find themselves pursued across Europe by a legendary French detective, they'll have to take their game to the next level.(n)

programme.title: Let The Bullets Fly
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Sichuan, bandit "Pocky" Zhang Mazi poses as a local governor in a dusty town, but finds himself at odds with the local mobster who is not eager to share his turf with another drifter. A complex and deadly series of mind-games ensues between the two crooks.(n)

programme.title: The Only Mom
programme.desc: A family moves out of town to raise an autistic daughter peacefully. The girl sleeps at daytime and awakes at night. The house gets stranger day by day with a mystery unsolved for decades.(n)

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: After a giant dinosaur skull is stolen, the head of the Chinese secret police decides to assign the case to the force's most incompetent reject: a rural butcher who stands around all day drinking martinis (shaken, not stirred).(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Of Blades 2
programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: Go Lala Go 2
programme.desc: A new cast breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career after a company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposes to Lala.(n)

programme.title: Love Undercover 2: Love Mission
programme.desc: The Crime Investigation Department is assigned to protect a princess-consort coming from the Republic of Puerto Risi.(n)

programme.title: The Left Ear
programme.desc: The Left Ear tells a painful love story of four teenagers. Seventeen-year-old LI'er is an introvert girl whose left ear suffers from poor hearing. One day, she suddenly expresses her love to Xu Ge who, however, becomes the boyfriend of an outgoing girl, Bala.(n)

programme.title: The Irresistible Piggies
programme.desc: Sai Gwai starts working in the same company LMF with his cousin Lun, and immediately meets the four "Piggies" - Mo, Mei, Hung and Pao. The four girls are discriminated by the other colleagues and are finally laid off by the company.(n)

programme.title: Wawa No Cidal
programme.desc: Like many others from the village, Panay lives and works in the city while leaving her two children back home in the care of her elderly father. When her father is diagnosed with cancer, Panay decides to move back to the village, only to find that many things have changed for the worse.(n)

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Powerful Chief Inspector Lak and his cohorts have practically turned half of Hong Kong into their corruption empire. This prompts the Hong Kong Governor to set up an anti-corruption arm to fight them.(n)

programme.title: The Cases
programme.desc: Edmond Poon hosts psychic programmes, supported by the metapsychology masters from Southeast Asia who act as advisors, and leads a psychic exploring team to scout for little-known mysterious and supernatural cases.(n)

programme.title: The Cases II
programme.desc: If spirits are everywhere, how can we solve the problem if they take offense by us? To reveal the truth, a crew proceeds by inviting a paranormal master to arrange a banquet serving all the ghosts around a graveyard, a so-called "extreme land".(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: Get Outta Here
programme.desc: Lucky for everyone involved, Joe doesn't like to drink human blood, and he forms a bond with his new flat mates. However, other vampires do lurk in Hong Kong, and they soon side with the greedy land developers angling for Apple's flat.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: San and Yo work as bodyguards-for-hire in Hong Kong, but business isn't exactly booming for these bumbling buddies. The two head to South Korea for a mysterious job to protect a reporter, but a hotel bombing leaves the client dead and sends them on the run as suspects.(n)

programme.title: Bakuman
programme.desc: Mashiro Moritaka has a knack for drawing. When classmate and aspiring writer Takagi Akito discovers Moritaka's drawing skills, he suggests they join forces to create a manga. Moritaka isn't so hot on the idea - that is, until a girl enters the picture to provide some extra motivation.(n)

programme.title: Zombiepura
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus breaks out in an isolated army camp, a lazy reservist soldier and his tough commander must work together to survive, and learn what it means to be real soldiers.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: On Trial
programme.desc: Three young men are on the edge of losing direction of their future. Will the way ahead be a broad, bright road or be full of thistles and thorns?(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places II
programme.desc: Unfazed by their new popularity, King Kong and Kodojak continue to pal around, find romantic misadventures, annoy the returning Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho, get framed for various crimes, and still regroup in time to rout the bad guys and save the day.(n)

programme.title: Pom Pom
programme.desc: Ah Chau and Beethoven are a pair of cops investigating a drug lord, but their ineptitude threatens to derail the case.(n)

programme.title: Zu Warriors From The Magic Mount
programme.desc: Set in fifth-century China, Ti Ming-chi is a young innocent from the West Zu army who wandered away from the battlefield and into a magical underworld filled with demons and murderous swordsmen.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Pink Dragon
programme.desc: Nerdy Inspector Lawrence Cheng becomes the object of a scam involving heartthrob Rosamund Kwan and tycoon gangster Damian Lau.(n)

programme.title: Happy Go Lucky ()
programme.desc: A blind woman, a mentally-impaired man and a man with a nervous disorder form a friendship in this inspirational tale.(n)

programme.title: Swordsman
programme.desc: The Sunflower Scripture is suddenly stolen from the Forbidden City. In order to avoid any scandal, head eunuch Koo Jin-foo appoints Cho Leng-tsan to investigate.(n)

programme.title: City On Fire
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewellery store.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Chun Wai is a young screenwriter who falls for aspiring actress Mei Ball, who can't find the success an actress of her calibre deserves. Instead, all the accolades go to Lulu, Mei Ball's gorgeous but unskilled actress friend.(n)

programme.title: Where's Officer Tuba?
programme.desc: Officer Tuba and Police Detective Chow attempt to hunt down a band of blackmailers. Unsuccessful in capturing the gang, Chow is gunned down and in his dying moment makes Tuba promise that he will defeat the gangsters and avenge his death.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire
programme.desc: A classic Hong Kong vampire comedy about Taoist priests who inadvertently turn a corpse into a murderous zombie. The planned reburial of a village elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, threatening mankind.(n)

programme.title: Queen Of Underworld
programme.desc: Har Jay was a mere waitress when she became romantically involved with a handsome young customer, but her life gets endlessly complicated when the selfish lover gets her pregnant and then refuses to help care for the baby.(n)

programme.title: The Wild Ones
programme.desc: Social worker Olivia Cheng attempts to tame four of Hong Kong's wildest reform schoolgirls, including Irene Wan and Loletta Lee.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai and Josephine are a merry couple. Tai brings his wife to his hotel's annual ball. Among his colleagues, there is a notorious seducer. Tai, with the help of his close friend Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife, bringing themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Fever
programme.desc: A married businessman's ill-advised dalliance with a mysterious beauty comes back to haunt him - literally - when it turns out his bedmate is one of a family of ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Why Why Tell Me Why
programme.desc: Anita Mui learns that mahjong and romance don't mix in a comedy where she must curb her mahjong addiction to get Anthony Chan.(n)

programme.title: Operation Scorpio
programme.desc: This film is a unique combination of Drunken Master, Sanshiro Sugata and Karate Kid with ingenuity and creative moves you have never seen before!(n)

programme.title: Devoted To You
programme.desc: A coming-of-age drama about the psychological changes of May Lo and Loletta Lee when they encounter Jacky Cheung and Michael Wong.(n)

programme.title: Good Times, Bed Times
programme.desc: Bored judge Raymond indulges himself in one-night stands and flirtations, causing his girlfriend Ah Qiu to leave him. Ah Qiu, a journalist, doesn't lose any time in falling in love with Keung, a super-cop she is sent to interview.(n)

programme.title: Okinawa Rendez-Vous
programme.desc: Jimmy Wong is a famous thief who runs into mixed-up situations and possible romance while hanging out in Okinawa. Jimmy becomes the top target of Hong Kong cop Dat, who's vacationing with his girlfriend and her best pal.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World 3
programme.desc: The Biu family collect their lottery winnings in Canada and return to Hong Kong, minus the second daughter due to a quarrel. After Mrs. Biu shows off her money to her old friends, she loses it all in a robbery. Now void of their new-found wealth, the Biu family must start over from scratch.(n)

programme.title: Millionaires Express
programme.desc: The No. 1 comedy hit of 1986 has kung-fu master Sammo Hung involved with officials, concubines, merchants and conmen in old China.(n)

programme.title: Mr Boo Meets Pom Pom

programme.title: Those Merry Souls
programme.desc: This supernatural kung-fu comedy stars Yuen Biao as a stuntman who reluctantly takes up the family profession: a collector of dead souls.(n)

He meets Anna, a triad boss' daughter who seeks out Duke Lee to use his blood as a potential life-saving elixir for her father.(n)

programme.desc: Chow Yun-fat plays Ah-Long, a single father trying to raise his son, Porky. Ah-Long works as a truck driver at a construction site. The son's real mother, Por-por, had left Ah-Long 10 years ago for the United States after a lovers' spat.(n)

programme.title: For Your Heart Only
programme.desc: Disc jockey Piggy Chan, mechanic Sapi and cousin Hayden form a trio: Lovebusters. Piggy falls in love at first sight with Jane Yu. He tears down all obstacles to win her heart. With the victory, he resumes his inclination to flirt around.(n)

programme.title: Market Romance
programme.desc: Happy-go-lucky Sister Kot is the owner of a fish market who adores pop singer Alex. Her secret admirer is Keung, a frequent customer. Keung discovers that Alex may actually be his lost brother.(n)

programme.title: 3 Days Of A Blind Girl

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: Jackie Chan produced this female version of Police Academy, with cop Siblelle Hu heading an all-girl commando training camp.(n)

programme.desc: Gambling-obsessed couple Mr and Mrs Luo, after hearing that a rival called Snake's recent run of luck has been due to his taking of "coffin air", decide to follow him one night, ending up in a run-down mortuary.(n)

programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: The Intellectual Trio
programme.desc: Wong Kar-wai co-scripted this comedy about cops Leslie Cheung and Billy Lau who encounter pickpockets Sandy Lam and Joyce Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Front Page
programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company, hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to hopefully save his failing business.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Vs. Vampire
programme.desc: Lam Ching Ying discovers that the water supply in his village has been contaminated by bats and, while in the process of digging a well to find new water supply, he inadvertently unearths the corpse of an evil priest.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Wu Yen stars Anita Mui as Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes. Qi is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: Previously imprisoned for an accidental killing, King returns to the world with his gambling skills intact, but his spirit gone. Help comes in the form of Skinny Dragon and his sexy sister Ching, who initially can't stand King, but eventually starts to warm to his undeniable charm.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: To his surprise, Yin Yau finds out he is in a post-apocalyptic world. It turns out to be one of the bets between Cheung San and Nuwa. On the impending full moon, Kau endeavors to stop Nino from transformation.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World
programme.desc: Bill, a TV news reporter, tries to make ends meet to support himself, his wife and three teenage daughters in urban Hong Kong. In the mist of the misadventures of Bill and his family, their luck and lives ultimately change when Bill's wife suddenly wins the lottery.(n)

programme.title: Fruit Punch
programme.desc: Hacken and his friends run their business but fail repeatedly. Even with a rich man's support, the business and his romance are still at stake.(n)

programme.title: Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: Chen Jun joins the Jin Wu Martial Arts Academy in hopes of refining his skills and striking back at his oppressors. When Chen's master is poisoned by the leaders of the Japanese occupation, the furious student puts his skills to the ultimate test by embarking on a skull-cracking revenge spree.(n)

programme.title: Affectionately Yours
programme.desc: Alan Tam is conned into a marriage by Eric Tsang, who wants to take over his flower shop. Then, Alan meets a girl of his dreams.(n)

programme.title: King Of Beggars
programme.desc: The spoilt son of a millionaire finds the love of his life, but she will only accept him if he proves himself as a kung-fu master. He enters and wins the Kung-Fu Scholar tournament, little realising that this victory will lead to him becoming penniless, homeless and sleepy.(n)

programme.title: Teppanyaki
programme.desc: Mr. Wong is the chief chef in his father-in-law's teppanyaki restaurant. One day, he meets his dream girl, Sissy. He starts chasing her and arranges for a tour to the Paradise Island with her. Unfortunately, his wife and her friend go with him.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story III

He meets Anna again and injures her. He also kills Kent's fellow officer. Kent vows to catch Bad Brain.(n)

programme.desc: Siu Fung, an owner of a pizzeria, unexpectedly succumbs to a heart attack. However, her spirit was unable to cross over to the other side, thus she resurrects into the body of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Truant Heroes

programme.title: The Good The Bad & The Beauty
programme.desc: A clever stewardess tries to double-cross an international smuggling ring by sneaking their loot into a hiding place.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Encounters
programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.desc: Alan and Tien have formed a bond since childhood that will last a lifetime. Later, they progress from pickpockets to gangsters running a successful nightclub business, but their refusal to get involved in drug trafficking incurrs the wrath of local crime boss Kao.(n)

programme.desc: Tin Yau discovers the previous life of himself and Siu Ling in the Qin Dynasty. Mei Loi looks for Nino, only to find Nino slaughtering people. Nino believes what he does is right. Mei Loi can't help freeing Nino.(n)

programme.desc: A violent criminal named White Tiger is on the run from the police and joins a theatre troupe to hide out, killing anyone who suspects his identity. One person he unsuccessfully tries to kill several times is a cowardly laundry man named Mousy.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China III
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung visits Beijing during a competition designed to determine which group has the best lion dancers.(n)

programme.title: Sweet Surrender
programme.desc: Shirley has a rebellious nature. She realises she is no longer able to tolerate her parents and she reckons it is about time for her to explore the outside world. After she sneaks away from home she goes to find her brother-in-law Frankie.(n)

programme.title: Beware Of Pickpockets

programme.title: The Return Of Pom Pom
programme.desc: Two detectives and best buddies investigate how the inspector is framed by a master thief. They accidentally meet the thief's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Parking Service
programme.desc: An optimistic Stanley decides to part with his beloved uncle and aunt and seek an ideal job. He joins a parking service team and earns good reputation for his team.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Wu Yen stars Anita Mui as Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes. Qi is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Security Unlimited
programme.desc: This film is about the misadventures of three employees of a private security company in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire

programme.title: One Husband Too Many

programme.title: A True Mob Story ()
programme.desc: Triad member Cheung Dee earns his living as a parking attendant. Fending off an ambush by a rival gang leader, Cheung Dee blinds the leader of the gang, Crazy Ball.(n)

programme.desc: Two cute kids plot to reunite parents Sam Hui and Olivia Cheng.(n)

programme.desc: Private eye Yoyo enlists help from Inspector Robin to obtain a secret formula for an important weapon in war-time China under Japanese attack.(n)

programme.desc: The story follows the romantic misunderstandings between Alex, an affable ad exec, and the two women in his life - Joe, a sardonic film director, and Ao. Alex flies out to Paris with Joe to film a commercial while his suspicious fiancee, Ao, keeps close tabs on him.(n)

programme.desc: Cheung Tit Chu, a senior inspector of the Special Crime Investigation Department in the Police Force, likes to make decisions and execute duties independently. programme.title: 100 Days My Prince

programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination attempt. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of a detective agency in Joseon.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Typewriter
programme.desc: Best-selling author Han Se-soo who is facing a creativity bottleneck, receives help from a mysterious ghostwriter for writing a novel that recall their previous intertwined lives.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Typewriter
programme.desc: Best-selling author Han Se-soo who is facing a creativity bottleneck, receives help from a mysterious ghostwriter for writing a novel that recall their previous intertwined lives.(n)

programme.title: SuperM's As We Wish
programme.desc: Seven members of SuperM are crossing items off their bucket list!(n)

programme.desc: It's a throwback to the time when Cha Seung Won and Yoo Hae Jin were sent to Man Jae Island to experience self-sufficient life for the first time!(n)

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap-dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.(n)

programme.title: SuperM's As We Wish
programme.desc: Seven members of SuperM are crossing items off their bucket list!(n)

programme.title: Thrifters On Tour: Korea
programme.desc: The hosts invite star guests and travel to different cities in Korea, and compete with each other to bring the most enjoyable vacation experience with the cheapest budget.(n)

programme.title: 3 Meals A Day- Mountain Village
programme.desc: 3 Meals A Day is back with an all-female cast! Yum Jung-ah, Yoon Se-ah, and Park So-dam travel to a wooded area to spend time together and cook meals with the food they find in the area.(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Oliver steps back from his Green Arrow duties to focus on his family. But things take a bloody turn when the team becomes targets for a serial killer they're tracking.(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Finally with a lead on the elusive terrorist Dante, Diggle and Lyla deploy the Ghost Initiative to apprehend him. Meanwhile, Oliver ties to bond with Emiko.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: Michael shocks a receptionist with a medical procedure that leaves both their jaws on the floor, and then at a party store, Michael reveals a regenerating piece of gum. Plus, an electrifying trick rewrites history.(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: At a library, Michael shocks people with every trick in the book, including a voice-controlled page-turner and outfit changes that almost get him recognized! And later, Michael amazes a trainee with a weightless mattress!(n)

programme.title: Breaking The Magician’S Code
programme.desc: The Masked Magician reveals the secrets behind Magic's biggest illusions including Walking through a Great Wall of Steel; Surviving being cut in half by The Giant Buzz Saw; and Making a Woman Vanish right before your eyes from a magic chair. Plus, the magician has a special illusion in store for his special guests, The WWE Divas.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel nervously tells her father, Dr. Leonard Green that she is pregnant.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: In this Thanksgiving episode, special guest star BRAD PITT.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler becomes upset when Monica spends a fortune on a luxurious pair of black boots.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross becomes nervous when his new girlfriend, Mona, wants to mail cute Christmas cards.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: To prepare Joey for a date, Rachel eagerly agrees to accompany him for an evening out.(n)

programme.title: Backtrace ()
programme.desc: Ready to crack the case at all costs, sheriff Skye (Sylvester Stallone) tracks the group of criminals who have taken hostage his enemy in order to revive his memory and find the missing cash.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: In a soaring new chapter in the epic story of the Man of Steel, Superman Returns to fight for truth and justice and protect the world he loves from cataclysmic destruction!(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him--a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate.(n)

programme.title: Charlie And The Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A young boy joins 4 others on a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world. A special grand prize awaits one of the kids at the end of the magical tour.(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.(n)

programme.title: Top 20 Funniest
programme.desc: Laughter is the best medicine...and it makes for a great television show, too! Get ready for non-stop hours of wall-to-wall laughs with TOP 20 FUNNIEST.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team investigates a murder linked to a counterfeit diamond operation, but an illness forces Jane to direct his colleagues from the office as he recuperates.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: After one of Neptune High's haughtier students brings a sexual harassment suit against a favorite teacher, Veronica is pitted against her father when the girl's parents hire Keith to help in their case. Meanwhile, with the tabloids claiming his momis still alive, Logan turns to Veronica to help him track down the truth. Later, Veronica discovers more unsettling information about Duncan's hidden medical condition.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: To her surprise, Veronica works as a "love detective" when she's asked to track down her friend Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) secret admirer and a Russian bride's estranged fiancé. Meanwhile, after discovering that a credit card belongingto Lynn Echolls, who apparently committed suicide recently, is being used, Veronica and Logan go to a Los Angeles hotel in hopes of finding either her or a clue.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: Following an emotional reunion with her mother, Veronica is hired to track down Neptune High's beloved mascot, Polly the Parrot, which was apparently kidnapped by a rival school on the eve of a big basketball game. Meanwhile, with her suspicions about the Kane family rekindled, Veronica attempts to gain access to her father's original interrogation tapes.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: As she continues investigating Lilly Kane's murder, Veronica pursues a risky lead that could discredit Abel Koontz's (not appearing in this episode) confession when she discovers that the convicted killer has a daughter, Amelia DeLongpre (ERIN CHAMBERS), who is about to receive a huge payoff from Jake Kane (recurring guest star KYLE SECOR). Logan stumbles onto Veronica's detailed computer files of everyone connected to Lilly's death.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: A series of fire drills leads Veronica to the discovery that Neptune High has been receiving bomb threats. She enlists Wallace and Mac's (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO) help to investigate classmates who could pose a serious threat to the school, including new student Ben (JONATHAN TAYLOR THOMAS - "Home Improvement," "Smallville"). Meanwhile, Keith stuns Veronica with the news of whom he's been secretly dating.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: As Bane enacts his final plan for Gotham's destruction, Gordon rallies his former enemies to save the city. And Bruce's decision to leave Gotham devastates Selina.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: In the series finale, Gotham flash-forwards a decade into the future, as Bruce Wayne returns to him home. With Penguin & Riddler up to their old tricks, the Dark Knight arrives.(n)

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow
programme.desc: John Constantine (MATT RYAN) informs the team of a new magical threat in the season four premiere, leading the team to Woodstock to deal with it.(n)

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow
programme.desc: The Legends find themselves headed to the Salem witch trials, where they learn that a magical creature in town is causing problems they hadn't expected.(n)

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny asks Leonard to lie to her father, Wyatt (guest star KEITH CARRADINE), while Howard, Raj and Bernadette pull an all-nighter at a telescope.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Penny's ex, Zack (guest star BRIAN THOMAS SMITH) while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
